title: Ikea's bargain Christmas tree deal is back - but almost twice the price
text:

As much as we love a real Christmas tree, the downside is having to buy a new one every year.

So it's good news for bargain hunters, as Ikea has just announced that they're bringing back their bargain real Christmas tree deal for the eighth year running.

All you have to do to get yours is pick up a real fir free in-store from Ikea for £29, and the cashier will hand over a £20 voucher at the till, making the tree itself just £9.

But depsite being under a tenner, the £9 price tag may infuriate some loyal fans of the offer, with the same trees usually only costing you a fiver - almost half the price compared to 2019's price.

This year, Ikea's Christmas tree deal will start a day earlier than last year, kicking off on the 21st November and lasting all the way up until the 24th December.

You can use the £20 voucher across a range of Ikea homewares from 13th January to 23rd February 2020, whether that's more impulse buys and decor or those all important light bulbs and extension leads you've been meaning to pick up for ages.

This year, Ikea's real fir Christmas trees will be sourced from Scotland, so they're from nice and close to home.

If you'd rather see what else is out there in the Christmas tree world first, we've also got a round up of the best Christmas trees for 2019 - both real and artificial.

Lisa Bradshaw, Home Decoration & Outdoor Sales Leader from IKEA UK and Ireland said, “Christmas is often a time when budgets are a little tighter, and we understand that shoppers are usually on the lookout for cost effective ways to make the festive season extra special for family and friends.

For many, a beautifully decorated tree is the heart of the home at Christmas time, so we know how important it is to offer the highest quality trees at an affordable price. What’s more, shoppers can redeem their £20 voucher across a whole range of homewares in-store, making the offer a gift that truly keeps on giving this Christmas”.
description: You can get a real Christmas tree for just £9 thanks to Ikea's handy deal
